info.title: Red Any% Glitchless - God Nido (by PaperGuy)

info.summary: Clear any existing save file by pressing Up + B + Select on the game title screen
Set text speed to FAST, battle animation to OFF and battle style to SHIFT
Give your character and your rival a one-character name
Optional: withdraw the PC Potion in your room
Choose Squirtle, and give it a one-character name
Tail Whip once (or twice if Growl turn 1), then spam Tackle

info.description: Kill an encounter for experience to get Bubble for Brock

info.summary: When delivering the Parcel, walk behind or next to Prof. Oak so that your (slow walking) rival takes fewer steps in the cut scene
Shop: Buy 3-8 Poke Balls, then go west to Route 22
info.description: 6 Poke_Ball
Use a manip of your choice to get a Lv. 4 Nidoran with perfect stats, and give it a one-character name
Return to Viridian City and go north, picking up the tree potion, and entering Viridian Forest

info.summary: Avoid encounters as much as possible by walking on encounterless grass tiles

info.description: Pick up the antidote on the way up
Be at least 10 HP before the Weedle Guy, and pick up the hidden Potion next to him

info.title: Weedle Guy
info.summary: Tail Whip x2, spam tackle. If you get poisoned, wait until after the fight to use the Antidote. If you fall below 7 HP, use a Potion

info.description: After the fight, swap Nidoran to the front, heal Squirtle to 17+ HP and heal poison if necessary

info.summary: Switch to Squirtle to share exp, use Bubble to kill Geodude and Onix. If Onix uses Bide on the turn you switch in, use Tail Whip twice, then Bubble
Shop: Change the battle style option from Shift to Set, and buy 7-10 Potions
info.description: 9 Potion

info.summary: Leer + HA x2 on all three, tackle if no kill or in range

info.title: Shorts Guy
info.summary: Leer + HA x2 on both (switch HA with Leer on ekans)
HA x2, HA x3, HA x2, HA x2 + Tackle

info.description: Catch a Spearow or a Pidgey in the grass patch. Use Poison Sting to weaken Lv. 5 Spearows, HA for Lv. 8 Pidgeys and Tackle for everything else

info.summary: Take the center before Mt. Moon

info.description: Follow this path up until the Lass

info.summary: If you see a Paras, catch it, or kill it for experience and get Paras using the manip

info.description: You need 138 total exp, kill two Zubats with a compined level of 18

info.summary: HA x3, HA x2 + Poison Sting
HA x2 + PS, HA x2, you should reach Lv. 16 and evolve into Nidorino here

info.description: Do the Mt. Moon manip to get an encounterless path up to the rocket, with a paras at the end

info.summary: Manip: Mt. Moon B2F :: 6 :: 14 15 14 3 // TODO: change slot

info.description: USE: Moon_Stone

info.summary: HA x2, HA + PS, HA x2 + PS

info.description: Choose the Helix Fossil (Heil Helix!)
Get the hidden Rare Candy behind the top-left house

info.summary: HA x3, HA, HA + PS, HA x2, if you get SA'd by Pidgeotto, switch to flier and let it die
HA + PS, HA x2, stay in if SA'd
HA + PS, HA x2, stay in if SA'd
Menu: Rare Candy to level 23 and teach Thrash over PS
info.description: USE: Rare_Candy :: 2
Get the hidden elixer above the hiker if you didn't use your antidote

info.summary: If you used your antidote, pick up the ether on the wall right of the Lass
Menu: Say YES to Bill, then heal to around 47-60 HP, Escape Rope back to Cerulean City and walk to the gym
info.description: USE: Escape_Rope
Pick up the Full Restore in the underground path with the jyngle skip

info.summary: Oddish? + avoid the Bug Catcher on the right
Heal to 16+ HP for the first trainer, 9+ for the second. If you need to heal, teach BB in this menu
Shop: If you're out of Poke Balls, only sell the Nugget
info.description:
-1 TM_34
-1 Nugget
3 Repels

info.summary: Menu: Heal to 20-30 HP for the rival battle, and teach Bubblebeam over Tackle
info.description: TM: Bubblebeam :: 0 :: Tackle

info.summary: HA x2 or BB x2, Thrash or HA x2 or BB x2, Thrash, if you get SA'd or confused, sacrifice your weakest slave

info.description: Get HM01 from the captain, then leave and head to the gym

info.summary: Menu: On the tile before the Cut bush, teach BB over tackle if you haven't yet
info.description:
SWAP: Repel :: 0
TM: Cut :: 3 // TODO: fix "TM: HM_01 :: 3"
TM: Dig :: 3

info.summary: Then Cut the bush, save one tile below it, do the can manip and fight Surge

info.description: After the fight, pick up the Bike Voucher from the chairman of the fan club, theb Dig back to Cerulean
Get the Bicycle from the bike shop

SWAP: Bicycle :: 1
TM: Thunderbolt :: 0 :: Leer

info.summary: Get on the bike and head east to Route 9, cutting the two bushes in your way
Thrash, if you get confused and are at low HP: switch to your weakest slave and back, if you get put to sleep: use your Full Restore
Menu: Use a Repel a few steps before entering Rock Tunnel
info.description: USE: Repel
Map to get through Rock Tunnel

info.summary: Menu: Use your second Repel a bit after the last fight
info.description: USE: Repel

info.summary: Menu: Use your third Repel before fighting the Hiker
info.description: USE: Repel

info.summary: After exiting, head south to Lavender Town and west to Route 8
Take the underground path to Celadon City

info.description: Pick up the hidden Elixer in the underground

1 TM_07
10 Super_Repel
2 Super_Potion
1 Poke_Doll

1 Fresh_Water
1 Soda_Pop
Get Ice Beam from the girl
Get Rock Slide from the girl
1 Fresh_Water

11 X_Accuracy
6 X_Special
4 X_Speed

info.summary: Take the elevator down to 1F and leave

info.description: Bike west, cut the bush, go through the building and get Fly from the girl in the house

info.summary: Menu: Upon exiting the house, use a Potion if below 19 HP
info.description:
SWAP: Super_Repel :: 1
TM: Horn_Drill :: 0 :: Horn_Attack
USE: Super_Repel
SWAP: X_Accuracy :: 2
TM: Fly :: 2
TM: Rock_Slide :: 0 :: Bubblebeam

info.summary: Fly to Lavender (3 down), and walk to the tower
Use a Potion if below 24 HP

info.description: Get the Elixer item ball immediately after the Channeler
Get the hidden Elixer on 5F
Get the Rare Candy that blocks the way, then enter the Ghost battle and escape using the Poke Doll

info.summary: Menu: Battle menu. Swap Elixers if you used the antidote
info.description:
SWAP: Elixer :: 3
USE: Poke_Doll
Talk to Mr. Fuji to warp to his house and get the Poke Flute, then walk out and Fly to Celadon City (1 down)

info.summary: Take the center to set the warp point for Dig
Menu: Upon exiting, use a Super Repel and bike west to the Snorlax and Cycling Road
info.description:
USE: Super_Repel
USE: Bicycle

info.summary: Menu: On the tile before the Snorlax
info.description:
SWAP: X_Speed :: 4
USE: Poke_Flute
Pick up the hidden Rare Candy

info.summary: Menu: After exiting the Cycling road building
info.description:
USE: Super_repel
TM: Ice_Beam :: 0 :: Rock_Slide
USE: Bicycle

info.summary: Bike to the Safari Zone, going around the bushes

info.description: Map of the Safari Zone
Get the Full Restore in the second area if you've already used your first one

info.summary: Menu: At the end of the first hill in the second area, move the cursor 1 up after
info.description: USE: Super_Repel
In the fourth area, get the Gold Teeth outside
Get Surf from the guy in the house, then Dig back to Celadon

info.summary: Bike east to Silph Co. in Saffron City, giving the Fresh Water to the guard in the house
Take the elevator to 10F, then go left and down to fight the Rocket, avoiding the Scientist

info.description:
SWAP: X_Special :: 5
TM: Surf :: 1 :: Tail_Whip
TM: Earthquake :: 0 :: Thrash

info.summary: Hug the east wall, then the south wall and take the teleporter to 5F

info.description: Go right to pick up the Card Key

info.summary: Take the teleporter to 9F and back to 5F, then open the door to your left and take the teleporter to 3F
Walk right, up, then open the door to your left, and take the teleporter to 7F
X_Accuracy + X_Speed + X_Special + HD, TB, EQ, EQ, HD (the "safe" option)
Dig back to Celadon, then Fly to Fuchsia (2 down) and walk to the gym
Hug the right wall when going up
Menu: Elixer, Candy and heal to 50+ HP to tank a confusion
info.description:
USE: Elixer :: 1 :: 0
USE: Rare_Candy :: 1 :: 0

info.summary: X_Accuracy + HD, HD, HD, TB x2 and Pokeflute until Selfdestruct

info.description: Bike east to the warden's house to get Strength, then fly to Pallet Town

info.summary: Menu: Use the remaining Rare Candies
info.description:
USE: Super_Repel
USE: Rare_Candy :: 2
USE: Bicycle

info.summary: Bike to the water and Surf south to Cinnabar Mansion

info.description: Take this path through the Cinnabar Mansion, flipping the switches and taking the candies on the way

info.summary: Menu: After falling down and taking the stairs
info.description:
USE: Super_Repel
TM: Strength :: 1 :: Tackle
Get the Rare Candy item ball in the room on the north
Get the hidden Rare Candy
USE: Rare_Candy :: 2 :: 0
Get the Secret Key, then Dig out and bike to Erika's Gym

info.summary: Hug the left wall and Cut the bush in the top-left corner
Walk out, then Fly to Cinnabar (2 down)
Dig out and bike to Saffron Gym
Dig out on the teleporter, then Fly to Viridian (1 up) and bike to the gym
Menu: Once in Viridian, use an elixer and then bike to the gym
info.description: USE: Elixer :: 1 :: 0

info.summary: Reload the positions of the trainers
IB, IB, EQ, EQ, IB x2
Menu: When outside of the gym
info.description:
USE: Super_Repel
USE: Bicycle

info.summary: Bike west to Route 22 and Victory road
X_Accuracy + X_Special + IB, IB, TB, EQ, EQ, HD

info.description: USE: Super_Repel

info.summary: Use Strength upon entering and push the first boulder onto the switch on the right, then bike to the ladder in the top-left corner
Use Strength again, push the boulder below onto the switch, bike up the steps hugging the north edge and use a Super Repel

info.description: USE: Super_Repel

info.summary: Bike to the right, down the stairs, then right and up to the ladder
Use strength again and push the boulder onto the switch to the left, then bike to the bottom-right corner and push the boulder down the hole and go down the hole
Menu: Use Strength first, then your last Super Repel
info.description:
USE: Super_Repel
USE: Bicycle

info.summary: Push the boulder onto the switch to the left, bike back to where you fell down and follow the ladders to the exit
Deposit all but Nidoking and flier
Shop: Optional if you have 2 Full Restores
info.description: 5 Full_Restores

info.summary: Switch to flier and let it die, X_Accuracy + HD, HD, HD, EQ, HD

info.description: USE: Elixer :: 1 :: 0

info.summary: X_Accuracy + IB, HD, HD, IB, HD
X_Special (or X_Speed if you want to play safe) + EQ, IB, EQ, EQ, EQ, if you get put to sleep, use the Poke Flute immediately. If you get Hazed, you lose your X Accuracy, so IB 2x Golbat and EQ Arbok
Menu: At least 2 steps before Lance, heal to ~130 HP to manipulate red bar from Gyarados and use your last PP item
info.description: USE: Elixer :: 1 :: 0

info.summary: X_Special + TB, X_Speed + IB, IB, IB, IB
Heal to 55+ HP and use your last PP item if you didn't already
X_Special + X_Accuracy + HD, HD, IB, HD, HD, HD, if Sky Attack turn 1, use a Full Restore
